features: FIRMING MOISTURIZING CREAM: Daily face moisturizer delivers intense hydration and reduces the appearance of deep wrinkles, improves skin firmness and brightens skin to a renewed glow; package may vary
NATURAL RETINOL ALTERNATIVE: Bakuchiol, a natural alternative to retinol but gentler on skin, effectively improves the texture of aging skin, evens skin tone and reduces dullness
ANTI-AGING FACE CREAM: This hydrating facial cream is clinically shown to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, improve firmness, and brighten skin with a natural retinol alternative
NOURISHING INGREDIENTS: Powerful anti-aging formula infused with wrinkle smoothing Bakuchiol and naturally hydrating Vitamin E which work in harmony to reveal the best radiant you
SKIN RENEWAL COLLECTION: Get clean nourishing feels from the full collection of Burt's Bees Skin Renewal products for that spa like home experience
body.description: Renew and reverse the many signs of aging with Burt's Bees Renewal Firming Moisturizing Cream. Clinically shown to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, improve firmness, and brighten skin for a renewed glow. This rich moisturizing face cream is infused with some of natures most powerful ingredients including Bakuchiol, a natural and gentler alternative to retinol, and Vitamin E, which work in harmony to reveal the radiant you with improved skin texture and even skin tone. Instantly hydrate and improve your skins natural moisture barrier with this nourishing formula for skin that looks healthy and smooth, for timeless beauty. This face cream is a simple, gentle way to revitalize and brighten your complexion with the benefits of Bakuchiol, a perfect ingredient to work into your daily beauty routine for gorgeous skin that is happy and youthful looking. Get clean and nourishing feels from the power of Burt's Bees Skin Renewal collection.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #1,685 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #50 in Face Moisturizers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely cream that softens skin
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy to have tried this cream, it is lovely. The texture and scent reminds me a bit of old school Noxzema cream. The texture is a bit whipped and feels so good on my skin. It absorbs nicely and my face still feels soft the next morning. There is a scent but it is light and earthy. I also like that the jar is glass and can be recycled or repurposed. This is my first time trying a Burt's Bees facial product and I am impressed and will be trying more of their products. I can't speak to its' antiaging properties yet, but at least my skin feels wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite moisturizing cream ever, have it used it for several years!
reviews.reviewText: I love the soft feel, very light scent, and excellent moisturizing of this day cream, enough so that I recently bought the night cream and love it as well. These are small jars, but both products go very far; you don't need to use but a small amount, as they are very effective. And they do not feel at all greasy, which some face creams -- especially for nighttime use -- often do. I highly recommend these products!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Absorbs Quickly, light, Fresh and works
reviews.reviewText: My Husband and I have used for more than 2 weeks. Dry patches and wrinkles are noticeably decreased. Scent is fresh, and feels light on skin. I use at night all over face, neck and back of hands and during the day I use it on stubborn areas and neck, and back of hands. I have tried many similar moisturizers. I appreciate the natural ingredients and the glass container that can be reused or easily recycled. I am pleased with this moisturizer, especially for the price, and I will buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I decided to try this face lotion because I fell in love with Burts Bees face makeup. I also just recently ordered they're masquera, and that is amazing as well..For the last 4 or 5 years I have had a lot of issues with irritable dry flaky skin. For the last few years I have been using only the most expensive face creams from brands like Lauriel or Olay, which were OK but the best i could find (and i have tried almost all possible) . This face lotion is %100 better than any other face lotion on the market, even ones that are twice the price. It leaves my skin feeling smoother than any other lotion and it doesn't leave a greasy feel like the other one that I was using. The smell is amazing and I am in love with it. I've had a couple dry patches on my skin for years. That just never go away. And this stuff makes them feel so much better they're actually disappearing. Also no more pimples and breakouts. I love that this lotion is 100% organic and 100% cruelty free, Which is why I decided to switch to this brand. And for many other reasons, I am so glad that I did. I will be a lifelong customer for all their products. ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super facial cream
reviews.reviewText: This face cream is amazing. It feels smooth and comforting going on, has a very pleasant smell and leaves face looking awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: ...which makes sense since beeswax is on the front end. Beeswax might be used to retain moisture, but I don't like the waxy feel.On the positive side, it has a nice scent and my skin feels moisturized. But, most importantly.. none of the ingredients are toxic/carcinogenic/hormone disruptor, etc.I was surprised to learn that the cosmetics and personal beauty products industry is not regulated. Which explains why there are so many toxic ingredients in beauty products. It's shocking how much of a dumping ground it's become.Just for fun...grab one or two products you're currently using and do a quick research on how safe the first few ingredients are for use on skin/hair. You might be in for a surprise.For instance, a common ingredient in toothpaste is used in industrial floor cleaners. The four most used ingredients in the majority of sunscreens are carcinogenic. The first ingredient in Elf Skin 'Holy Hydration' (sold at Target and Amazon) is Avobenzone--a known hormone disrupter.. and carcinogenic.I've read that 60-70% of what you put on your skin is absorbed. Contrary to thinking it just stays on the skin.One website I use to find out if certain ingredients are safe to use on skin is Environmental Working Group. They also provide lists of skin creams, lotions and sunscreens that have been rated for safety based on scientific research of ingredients in the product. If there isn't much information on an ingredient, they list that too.The bottom line is, we have very little control over what we're exposed to in our environment. But, we can be more selective in what we put on our skin...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it claims!
reviews.reviewText: Pros: After using this product for only two weeks, my skin is noticeably smoother and firmer. My pores appear smaller and my skin is much softer. I’ve had several compliments on how good my skin looks since using this product.Cons: Cream is a bit thick and the scent leaves a lot to be desired.I will definitely continue to use this product and would highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing and Inexpensive!
reviews.reviewText: I’m 26 y/o female who has dry skin. Winters are not my friend so I always need some new moisturizer for the season and I tried Acure line but it was too thin, I need thicker moisture. Also I am always scared to try to new cleansers and moisturizers because I easily get chemical burns/rashes from my sensitivity…I do see some results in regard to some fine lines under my eyes fading. I’m 26 so I don’t have wrinkles to test the fade. But it smells good, and it moisturizes well. I may keep this as a year round face moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Delivered today Jar was undone no seal over the cream don’t smell like a burts bees product not sure it is what it say it is
La llevo usando poco tiempo para opinar, pero hasta ahora no me convence.
Skin appeared smoother a week after using but the smell is quite acidic and lingers and it's a shame. Will use it all up as it is very good but probably won't repurchase.
Excelente calidad, nivel de humectación muy bueno y no causa reacciones.
This is the first time I'm disappointed with Amazon purchase. The cream was not sealed. Seems an used one and the smell is awful.
